website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a wooden lid made of cedar and extra large handles. Adds to the aesthetics of the cookware, but it's also practical and functional.
pros: The lid helps keep finished dishes warm and can protect from food splatters
The handles are extra large for easy grip while cooking and transferring dishes
Nice and heavy so you can stir food without holding the handles
Not sticky at all and the wood lid fits very well
Nice wok to prep vegetables and meats for two
cons: The pot may not be even
The lid also has natural accruing cracks

customer_reviews.title: Rust Rules
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Kaisan work since September 2018. I was looking forward to having the Kaisan wok as a new addition to my cast iron family. However I am disappointed in that after I cook with it, the wok immediately starts to rust. I don't leave food in it long after cooking it because the food taste "rusty". I know about the care of cast iron. I don't use soap. I have tried canola oil, coconut oil, and peanut oil to no avail. I always end up with a rusted wok! It may become my next planter! Not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: It is made well and the cover is perfect, well fitted and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Got this in December 2017 and have been enjoying ever since. It is made well and the cover is perfect, well fitted and lovely. I would buy another! Not too big not too small. Nice and heavy so I can stir food without holding the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Arista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wok, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic wok, excellent customer service actually reached out to me shortly after purchase with extra care tips and info. It was a Christmas gift for my husband who loves to cook, and it has really improved the quality of his stir fry, in my opinion. He says he can stir more easily than in the cast iron skillet he previously used, and sauces seem more evenly distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron wok
customer_reviews.text: Need guidance - everything I try to cook sticks to rough inside surface ---- help me love this pan
customer_reviews.author: N. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: ... that it's cast iron as she thinks it cooks better, I must say we made stir fry the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves that it's cast iron as she thinks it cooks better, I must say we made stir fry the other day and it turned out so very good, would recommend this wok to any one serious about cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bagley

customer_reviews.title: The lid not as safenm as it could be.
customer_reviews.text: The Wok itself is great. Please Watch out for the unsealed and cures lid. Myself and partner have gotten splinters when trying to clean. Otherwise, we like the wok, just be careful. Woefully they figure out how to deal the lid so people don't get hurt or injured.
customer_reviews.author: Hyalani

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Thus was a birthday gift for my son. He loved it and was impressed that it came preseasoned and with a lid!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Chacon

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. It made me like to cook everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 weeks, I loved it. It made me like to cook everyday even on weekends. It's really good for cooking Chinese dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Fish

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing but good things to say about this wok
customer_reviews.text: I brag about my wok and show it off every available opportunity. The cedar lid lends something to meals being cooked in it too. It's not often you find an object that is both functional and appealing to the eye. I'm super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hasse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, chose this one over a few cheaper competitors.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my grill and cook the protein on the side to get char then add it into the wok for stir fry or fried rice. The wood lid is great and the extra long handles make it easier to move.
customer_reviews.author: YJGuy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Wok
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good size, and I love using it! Not the typical wok so might not be what some are looking for, but much love for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefánia

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: I love cast iron this piece sits on my stove at all times. The texture inside is great for cooking. (Holds the food up on the sides) but cleaning it takes some extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jer--

customer_reviews.title: This is legit! I highly recomend this Wok
customer_reviews.text: The company had my order shipped and arriving early for greater gift giving ease. The Wok with the cover is very nice, conducts heat evenly and well and the wood top (only used once so far) was used for presentation at dinner. I would definitely encourage others to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Follman

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing! Better than I expected and for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! Better than I expected and for the price, couldn't find anything any close to this and the price!!!! Shipping was as stated right on time. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It cooks food evenly
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a while now. I love it. It cooks food evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: and the wok was easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Made shrimp fried rice the day after we got the wok..on the grill! It was fabulous, and the wok was easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wok, a lil bit heavy. And I do love the wood lid.
customer_reviews.author: NNW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is not sticky at all and the wood lid fits very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best wok I love! I used it for friend twice and surprised me it didn’t even stick. Very easy to clean. The only problem is it’s heavy and I can’t hold it with one hand when food is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Li Shen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Wok. The cast iron holds the heat and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Wok. The cast iron holds the heat and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: The wok is nice matches our new stove top
customer_reviews.text: The wok is nice matches our new stove top. Disappointed with the wood lid pretty sure it was advertised as bamboo,it is Cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Juhl

customer_reviews.title: Gets rusted easily.
customer_reviews.text: It get's easily rusted every after cooking especially soup dish. I'm so frustrated that i never get to return it in time within its return policy due date.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wok! We are buying more for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not to recommend this iron. I wash the first day then next day a lot of rush!!! Waist my money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely order more form this company. Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Q.

customer_reviews.title: ok. hard to clean and does have residue initially ...
customer_reviews.text: ok. hard to clean and does have residue initially. too much trouble to use regularly. expensive item for just an occasional use. too much hassle
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this Wok as a Christmas gift and they loved it !!! Delivery was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: vicki laird

customer_reviews.title: I have bought several wok's and was never satisfied, but this one is absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several wok's and was never satisfied, but this one is absolutely amazing. It is the perfect size and nothing stuck to the pan! Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: its beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is so beautiful. I am improving my stir fry skills with it!. I leave it on top of the stove simply to admire it. I wish it were a little lighter and possibly made of carbon steel, but I wouldn't sacrifice the grace of the handles for anything, or the beautiful wood top. It is pre-tempered and that has worked well. I wash it in hot water only, then dry it for a minute on the stove. I add oil the next time I cook.
customer_reviews.author: mary.cowmeadow

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok'er
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a number of times the last few weeks, pleased with how it cooks & cleans up, much better than an old steel one i'd tried years ago. The lid is useful too, I like the woodenness of it, light also. Seems durable based on it's weight! I keep it oiled after cleaning it, ready to use for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sustainability First

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived VERY quickly and we have been using it non-stop ever since. It showed up pre-seasoned as promised and is a beautiful piece of cookware. Seller was attentive and cleaning instructions were included which was very helpful. If this is a gift for someone in your house be warned, it does say what it is on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Servalli

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wok ever. It gets and stays very hot, perfect for stir frys, but also is a beautiful cast iron cooking vessel and works like a good cast iron pan. I own 3. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Wok, its beautiful and the wooden top add so much more personality and quality to the Wok!
customer_reviews.author: TheFreshFamily

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to toss vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Love it now, but it really wasn't pre seasoned. Things stuck. But with aggressive seasoning. Its perfect
customer_reviews.author: C_G

customer_reviews.title: Great little wok for two
customer_reviews.text: Nice wok to prep vegetables and meats for two. Like the lid to help keep it from trapping moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: The lid is deal breaker!
customer_reviews.text: The wok itself isn't anything special, not better nor worth than cheaper ones. The lid is nice looking but not sealed in anyway. The lid got lots of natural accruing cracks. No protection from liquids. Would be hard to wash if gets dirty. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: anthony rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful- works great and I love the wooden top.
customer_reviews.author: tracy gribbon

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it...holds enough to feed the family...perfect heat conduction. The bamboo lid is novel and wirjs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ann Sjostrom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wok!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wok, had many before but never a cast iron. This is by far the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Osborn

customer_reviews.title: So very Asian, yet american!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't cooked with it yet; but as an object d'art, it's beautiful - and unique as far as i know!? Its design is flawless in my eyes. Curious about how the wood lid will take on steam, grease, etc.!? Comments?
customer_reviews.author: larry myers-mcelwee

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a pro with this wok
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, substantial wok. I used it to cook dumplings, vegetable lo mein, and Mongolian beef. Everything was cooked quickly and was delicious. Cleanup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: comfortmaven

product_meta.title: Kasian House Cast Iron Wok, Pre-Seasoned with Wooden Lid 12" Diameter and Large Handles, Stir Fry Pan
feature_bullets: READY TO USE Cast iron wok has been pre-seasoned and is ready to use right out of the box.
HEAT RETENTION Cast iron wok is perfect for retaining heat while cooking, so great for those quick stir fry recipes.
BEAUTIFUL WOODEN LID Most woks don't have lids, but this one comes with a unique wooden lid that keeps food warm until ready to serve.
MUTLIPLE COOKING SURFACES The flat bottom makes it great for gas and electric stove tops and even outdoor grills.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED Kasian House guarantees all of their products.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
